characters.name: Loid Forger
alt_names: ロイド・フォージャー
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187 cm
__Occupation:__ Psychiatrist, Spy (Covertly)
__Affiliation:__ Berlint General Hospital, WISE (Covertly)
__Relatives:__ Yor Forger (Wife), Anya Forger (Adoptive Daughter)

Loid Forger is the main protagonist of the SPY x FAMILY series. He is the top spy of the Westalian Intelligence Bureau, who is only known by his code name Twilight. In order to investigate the activities of a highly ranked politician, Donovan Desmond, Twilight has assumed the identity of a psychiatrist named Loid Forger. Further, to appear like a normal family man and get close to his target, Loid then adopted a young orphan girl, Anya, and entered a Marriage of Convenience with an Ostanian woman named Yor Briar... who unknown to Twilight are themselves a Telepath and Professional Killer respectively.

characters.name: Yor Forger
characters.description:
__Height:__ 170 cm
__Occupation:__ City Hall Clerk, Assassin (Covertly)
__Affiliation:__ Berlint City Hall, Garden (Covertly)
__Relatives:__ Loid Forger (Husband), Anya Forger (Adoptive Daughter), Yuuri Briar (Younger Brother)

Yor Forger is the tritagonist of the SPY x FAMILY series. She is a clerical employee at the Berlint City Hall. She is soft-spoken and mild-mannered, but has a strong sense of humor. She has a bad drinking habit and falls into a coma when she drinks. At home, she struggles to be a good wife and a kind mother. Although her cooking skills are not very good, she likes to keep clean and is good at cleaning.
While she works in the capital of Ostania's city hall... or at least that's her civilian cover. In truth, she is an infamous Professional Killer known as "Thorn Princess". After becoming overly fixated on the idea her cover might be blown after a coworker ribs her about not being married or even having a boyfriend, Yor suggests to Loid a Marriage of Convenience, which he accepts, as he needs a mother for Anya for his own mission.

~!As of Mission (Chapter) 44, it is revealed that Yor is part of Garden, a powerful paramilitary assassin organization operating within Ostania.!~

characters.name: Anya Forger
alt_names: アーニャ・フォージャー
characters.description:
__Height:__ 99.5 cm (3'2")
__Occupation:__ First-Grade Student, Test Subject (Formerly)
__Affiliation:__ Eden Academy, Unknown Organization (Formerly)
__Relatives:__ Loid Forger (Adoptive Father), Yor Forger (Adoptive Mother)

Anya Forger is the deuteragonist of the SPY x FAMILY series. She is a young girl who Twilight finds at an orphanage. Believing her to be a smart child, he decides to adopt her for his mission. What he doesn't know is that Anya is an esper who escaped from the Lab that gave her the power to read minds. Starving for excitement in her life after spending most of it so far in a lab, Anya actively sought to be the one adopted by Loid and then make sure Loid and Yor got together, so she could have a spy and assassin for parents. Anya is the only Forger aware of just about everyone's Secret Identities, but keeps it to herself out of fear that if her psychic powers are exposed she'll be put in a lab again.

characters.name: Becky Blackbell
alt_names: ベッキー・ブラックベル
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Blackbell Family, Blackbell Heavy Industries, Eden Academy, Cecile Hall
__Occupation:__ Student

The daughter of the CEO of Blackbell, a major military manufacturer. Attends Eden Academy as part of Cecil House, Group 3. Best friends with Anya Forger.

Becky is a very kind child but with her being the daughter of a major military manufacturer, she is shown to be somewhat prideful and tries to be mature, attempting to take Anya under her wing as an act of benevolence when she views Anya as a brat. She does not attempt to get close to Damian Desmond despite his social position, even looking down on their classmates who try to befriend Damian and Anya who is initially bullied by Damian's group. Anya's confident smile later wins over Becky's admiration.

characters.name: Damian Desmond
alt_names: ダミアン・デズモンド
characters.description:
__Height:__ 110 cm (3′7″)
__Affiliation:__ Desmond Family, Eden Academy, Cecile Hall
__Occupation:__ Student

The second son of Donovan Desmond and attends Eden Academy as part of Cecile House, Group 3.  

A young child with an arrogant and rude personality, caused by him being the second son of Donovan Desmond, the leader of the National Unity Party, a group important and powerful enough to threaten the peace between the East and the West. This has caused Damian to gain a highly respected status among his peers and making him incredibly arrogant, assuming Anya gained a crush on him when she stared at him. He is shown to prefer being called Lord Damian when spoken to. He gets angry when he is looked down upon by Anya's smile, quickly resorting to insulting her with his limited vocabulary and harassing Anya.

characters.name: Yuuri Briar
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179 cm (5′10")
__Affiliation:__ Ostania, Ministry for Foreign Affairs (Cover), State Security Service
__Occupation:__ Diplomat (Formerly, Cover), Counterintelligence Agent

Yor Briar's younger brother who works in the State Security Service (SSS). He keeps his job at the SSS a secret from Yor, while pretending to be a normal civil servant at the foreign ministry.

Yuri has a sister-complex, and even at an early age, he would be doing everything he could to get Yor to praise him with affection. Though this could be due to his mother dying at a very early stage in his life causing him to get very attached to Yor as a mother figure.

characters.name: Sylvia Sherwood
alt_names: シルヴィア・シャーウッド
characters.description: She is Twilight's main contact at WISE.

characters.name: Franky Franklin
alt_names: フランキー・フランクリン
characters.description:
__Height:__ 166 cm (5′5")
__Affiliation:__ Ostania
__Occupation:__ Tobacco Store Clerk (False Front), Informant, Soldier (formerly)

Franky is an informant who seemingly works at a tobacco store and presumably works for Loid Forger's agency. He gets information regarding Eden Academy's exam and Anya Forger's past records for Loid Forger.

Franky is a kind person willing to help Loid out when he's in a pinch even though the danger is high. He frequently warns Loid Forger not to get too close to other people in their line of work.

He frequently falls in love with other women but his love life typically fails due to lack of mutual interest or they are already with someone else.

characters.name: Bond
characters.description: Bond is the recently adopted pet of the Forger Family. Formally known as Subject 8, Bond has been used for experiments that resulted in the dog gaining precognition abilities.

characters.name: Henry Henderson
alt_names: ヘンリー・ヘンダーソン
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Eden Academy
__Occupation:__ History Teacher, Housemaster of Cecile Hall

Henry is a mature and noble person, who places a high importance on "elegance". To him, elegance seems to be the way a person conducts themselves, and is not afraid to correct inelegant behavior in others.

characters.name: Fiona Frost
alt_names: Nafalia Foney (トバリー・フォニー)
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172cm
__Occupation:__ Hospital Assistant (secretly a spy)

A spy who works undercover as an assistant to [Loid Forger](https://anilist.co/character/138101/Loid-Forger) at Berlint General Hospital to provide him with mission details. Fiona is deeply in love with Loid, even telling Loid to replace Yor and let her take over the role of the Forger wife.

characters.name: Keith Kepler
characters.description: The leader of a terrorist group consisting of isolationist college students from Berlint University, intending on assassinating Foreign Minister Brantz to start a war between Westalis and Ostania.

characters.name: Camilla
characters.description: One of Yor Forger's three co-workers at Berlint City Hall.

characters.name: Donovan Desmond
alt_names: ドノバン・デズモンド
characters.description: Donovan Desmond is the President of the Nation Unity Party and Twilight's current target.

characters.name: Ewen Egeburg
alt_names: ユーイン・エッジバーグ
characters.description: Best Friend of Damian  and Student at Eden Academy. He is a loyal person, devotedly following Damian, almost always holding his bag when they walk to class. He also genuinely cares for Damian as a friend, getting concerned for Damian when he is hurt or pushing himself too hard.

characters.name: Emile Elman
alt_names: エミールぅ・エルマン
characters.description: Best Friend of Damian  and Student at Eden Academy.

characters.name: Kokkahoankyoku Chuui
characters.description: A scarred man who is a lieutenant and a higher position than [Yuuri Briar](https://anilist.co/character/150425/Yuuri-Briar) in the SSS. He seems to be fairly close to Yuuri and is aware of his drinking habits and sister complex, advising Yuri to get over his sister and focus on his work.

characters.name: Kris
characters.description: A student at Berlint University and a member of the Berlint Terrorist group led by [Keith Kepler](https://anilist.co/character/280308/Keith-Kepler).

characters.name: Kurt
characters.description: A  student at Berlint University and a member of the Berlint Terrorist group led by [Keith Kepler](https://anilist.co/character/280308/Keith-Kepler).

characters.name: Monica McBride
alt_names: モニカ・マクブライド
characters.description: Works at Mokumoku Club, a cigar club on Fifth Street.

characters.name: Brantz Daijin
characters.description: A foreign minister from Westalis. He is the target of [Keith Kepler](https://anilist.co/character/280308/Keith-Kepler)'s assassination plan.

characters.name: Shinonome
characters.description: An Ostanian spy who thinks of himself as a rival to [Twilight](https://anilist.co/character/138101/Loid-Forger). He is shown to be a highly untalented, yet lucky, spy.

characters.name: George Glooman
alt_names: ジョージ・グルーマン
characters.description: A student at Eden Academy and a member of Cecile Hall. He is the son of the CEO of Glooman Pharmaceuticals, a company later bought by the Desmond Group.

characters.name: George no chichi
characters.description: Father of George Glooman. He was the CEO of Glooman Pharmaceuticals until the company was bought by The Desmond Group.

characters.name: Carrol Campbell
alt_names: キャロル・キャンベル

characters.name: Cavi Campbell
alt_names: キャビー・キャンベル
characters.description: After obtaining a fortune in the energy sector, he became known as one of the world's foremost collectors of classical art. He is one of the organizers of Campbelldon, an underground tennis competition.

characters.name: Erik Zacharis
characters.description: Colonel Zacharis was in the East's Military Intelligence Division during the war and played a major role in ending the war. He previously owned the Lady In The Sun painting that holds a clue to the location of the Zacharis Dossier, rumored to contain information that could "reignite the war."

characters.name: Martha Marriott
characters.description: Butler of the Blackbell family and typically acts as [Becky](https://anilist.co/character/150423)'s caretaker.

characters.name: Narrator
characters.description:
This character page is set to represent and list all narrators, which haven't been given a visual representation of themselves in their respective work. 

Please add other narrator characters, which were given a visual representation of themselves, separately from this narrator page.

characters.name: Bondman
characters.description: The protagonist of Spy Wars and the number one spy in the show. He frequently has to take down enemies from the League of Evil in order to save Princess Honey.

characters.name: Honey-hime
characters.description: Princess of the kingdom where Spy Wars takes place. She is frequently saved by Bondman which has caused her to develop feelings for him.

characters.name: Demetrius Desmond
alt_names: デミトリアス・デズモンド
characters.description: First son of the Desmond family and the older brother of [Damian Desmond](https://anilist.co/character/150424/). He is an Imperial Scholar and is noted by [Loid Forger](https://anilist.co/character/138101/) to be an exceptional student, barely getting a single question wrong on the midterm exams.
